institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 32 (Management of training facilities and equipment, etc.)
contents: Article 32 (Management of training facilities, equipment, etc.) ① The joint training center must attach or install a sign on the supported training facilities, equipment, teaching materials, teaching materials, etc., ② The joint training center must attach or install a sign on the supported training facilities, equipment, teaching materials, etc. , In order to manage educational materials, etc., an industry-led youth customized training project asset management ledger (hereinafter referred to as *asset management ledger) containing the following items must be prepared (in this case, it can be replaced with HRD-Net registration), 1. Management number, 2. Product name, 3. Purchase amount, support amount, 4. Value remaining after increasing/decrease in quantity, depreciation, etc. as of the end of each year (residual value), 5. Utilization performance ③ The joint training center receives support Training facilities, equipment, etc. may be used temporarily and intermittently, limited to government-supported education, training, and evaluation projects, and practice outside of training hours for employees of contracting companies, etc., to the extent that they do not interfere with industry-led training projects. However, the supported training facilities and equipment cannot be transferred, exchanged, rented, or provided as collateral.
